Name: Verify Shop Page Navigation and Login Functionality
Description: Navigate to the home page and log in. Click on the shop hyperlink and verify the shop page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://parabank.parasoft.com/
step 2: Login
step 3: Click on link 'Shop'
step 4: Click on link 'Shop' -> Navigate to page 'shop'
step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Login and Page Navigation at Parabank Index
Description: Navigate to the Parabank index page and log in. Enter the username and password, then click to access the Parabank index page. Verify the page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
step 2: Login
step 3: Enter input value in input field 'username'
step 4: Enter input value in input field 'password'
step 5: Click on input field
step 6: Click on body  -> Navigate to page 'parabank/index.html'
step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Login and Page Navigation at Parabank Login
Description: Navigate to the Parabank index page and log in. Click on the footer panel, enter the username and password, and then proceed to the Parabank login page. Verify the page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
step 2: Login
step 3: Click on div 'footerPanel'
step 4: Enter input value in input field 'username'
step 5: Enter input value in input field 'password'
step 6: Click on input field  -> Navigate to page 'parabank/login.htm'
step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
